body_html: Actually, guys, flagging this one... cmake/FindCUDA.cmake and Modules_CUDA_FIx are supposed to be backports of the main cmake repo master, do you know if it possible for us to keep consistency with it? Otherwise, the local change we made in FindCUDA.cmake may be overridden by the backport next time.

body: Actually, guys, flagging this one... cmake/FindCUDA.cmake and Modules_CUDA_FIx are supposed to be backports of the main cmake repo master, do you know if it possible for us to keep consistency with it? Otherwise, the local change we made in FindCUDA.cmake may be overridden by the backport next time.
